problem:
PRI = "V*I" PRV = "V^2/R" ERT = "V*I*T"
Just a reminder of power and energy...
In this simple network, what is the power dissipated in the resistor, in terms of \(V\) and \(I\)?
What is the power dissipated in the resistor, in terms of \(V\) and \(R\)?
In an interval \(T\) what is the energy dissipated in the resistor, in terms of \(V\), \(I\) and \(T\)?
